title: Did CNN Report That Antifa Took Responsibility for US Capitol Riot?
subtitle: A crudely doctored screenshot, complete with glaring spelling errors, was part of a broader effort to falsely link left-wing activists with the pro-Trump attack on the U.S. Capitol.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In January 2021, a CNN broadcast featured a chyron that read, "Antifa has just taken responsiblitly [sic] for storming Capital [sic] Hill."
